DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy OPTIVE FUSION™ compare VISMED® Multi management dry eye .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study OPTIVE FUSION™ With VISMED® Multi Management Dry Eye
DOC.criteria: Use artificial tear dry eye eye least 3 month Use preservativefree artificial tear least twice daily 2 week ; Cataract , laserassisted situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) , photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) surgery last 12 month Use punctal plug contact lens last month Active ocular allergy within last 2 year Best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) less 20/200 either eye
